display_long_description:
🏆 Welcome to Gorilla Fun 1V1 – Build, Shoot, and Dominate the Arena! 🏆

Get ready for intense 1v1 action like never before! From the creators of Gorillafunvr , this brand-new experience throws you into fast-paced duels where strategy, skill, and quick reflexes decide the winner. Build structures, dodge bullets, and outgun your opponent in a battle of brains and brawn — all with the wild movement and energy of the GorillaFun universe.

🔥 GAME FEATURES:

🦍 Gorilla-Style Movement
Climb, jump, swing, and wall-run your way through custom arenas using your own skill — no joysticks, just pure GorillaFun motion.

🔫 Build & Shoot Mechanics
Drop walls, ramps, and towers instantly while blasting your opponent with a variety of weapons. Build fast or be outplayed!

⚔️ 1v1 Multiplayer Duels
Challenge real players in live head-to-head battles. Quick matchmaking keeps you in the action with no waiting.

🎯 Skill-Based Combat
No auto-aim, no pay-to-win — just raw skill and clever building. Every match is a test of your reflexes and strategy.

🌍 Cross-Platform Action
Play with friends or random players — whether you're on mobile or future platforms, the fight is always on.

🎙️ Voice Chat Included
Communicate with your opponent (or just taunt them) live with built-in voice chat.

Are You the Ultimate Gorilla Fighter?
Step into the arena. Build your defense. Fire your shot.
Only one gorilla walks away victorious.

Download Gorilla Fun 1V1 now — let the battle begin!
